title: Polki & Pink Tourmaline Push Button Studs - Enchanting Raasi Jhumkis
materials: SI clarity). Features a Hyderabadi polish for lasting luster.
features: These unique earrings blend traditional polki diamond craftsmanship with a modern floral and geometric design. The flower detailing is created from multiple pink tourmaline cabochons, while the central polki diamond is set in a rectangular frame and framed by micro-pave set diamonds for extra shine. The Push button design adds a modern touch.
occasions: or special occasions. Adds a touch of South Indian elegance to both traditional and contemporary attire. Ideal for cocktail parties and anniversary celebrations.
description: This piece is a unique fusion of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and modern design sensibilities. The exquisite polki diamonds and vibrant tourmalines make it a treasured heirloom piece. The secure push button closure ensures comfortable and confident wear. Polki diamond jewelry holds significant cultural value and is considered auspicious, especially for brides.
